ygData.subject: Re: 10 slot back packs
ygData.msgSnippet: I m pretty sure that most towns have the backpack pattern.  Where ever you find a merchant with a sewing kit.. normally its there right next to the arrow
ygData.messageBody:
I'm pretty sure that most towns have the backpack pattern.� Where ever you
find a merchant with a sewing kit.. normally its there right next to the
arrow quiver pattern.� I believe it will cost 1p to 2p per pattern.

-----Original Message-----
From: Sean Buvala [mailto:sean@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 1:01 PM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com; EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] 10 slot back packs


At 12:22 PM 7/6/99 -0400, Rebel Yell wrote:
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Rand A. Babcock <rbabcock@...>
>To: EverQuest@onelist.com <EverQuest@onelist.com>
>Date: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 12:16 PM
>Subject: Re: [EverQuest] 10 slot back packs
>
>
>>From: "Rand A. Babcock" <rbabcock@...>
>>
>>Greetings,
>>
>>10 slot backpacks are created using a large sewing kit, a backpack
pattern,
>>and a high quality bearskin.� The sewing kit and the pattern are available
>in
>>Highpass.� I do not know what tailoring skill level is required to succeed
>>however...
>>
>>Kritas

I have seen the patterns at a merchant in Kelethin, too.
sean
